scripts.push:master: git add . & git commit -m '取消自定义主题' & git push
scripts.deploy:build: npm run docs:build && npm run deploy:dist
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:build && npm run push:master
scripts.dist:deploy: ls -al && git init && git status && git add . & git commit -m '部署' & git push -f git@github.com:LDQ-first/vuepress-test.git master:gh-pages
